news.title: Chandigarh admin to decide on 50% property tax rebate to colony dwellers
news.para: Councillors of all political parties said that these arrears were not justified, particularly because people had not been informed on time when the tax was imposed a few years back and now suddenly, tax bills were sent with huge amount of arrears.

news.title: New Ghaziabad civic body panel rejects proposal for hike in house tax
news.para: “The house tax hike proposal has been rejected by the GMC executive committee. GMC had proposed to levy more tax on houses in affluent localities as compared to the less developed areas, but it now stands rejected,” a civic body official told TOI on Saturday.

news.title: Hyderabad civic body earns Rs 708 crore in property taxes
news.para: The GHMC counters saw significant q ueue lines on Saturday as residents tried to avail themselves of the scheme as it expires on April 30.

news.title: Chandigarh housing board eyeing big bucks from 123.79-acre land at IT Park
news.para: The CHB has decided to start e-auction of sites on the on the 123.79 acres of land acquired from Parsvnath Developers Limited for housing projects.

news.title: Chandigarh civic body's general house nod to sell properties on freehold
news.para: The matter will be sent to the UT administration for formal approval to the conversion to dispose of the properties not being sold for past over a decade despite multiple attempts owing to their leasehold nature.

news.title: Jaipur development body plans to issue 92,000 lease deeds in Shahar-II
news.para: An official said, “As per the plan, the JDA will issue approximately 6,000 lease deeds per month. The civic body has already carried out a survey and prepared a plan to distribute 67,000 lease deeds. The process to issue more lease deeds is underway.”

news.title: Chandigarh: Prospective bidders demand single-window clearance
news.para: UT chief conservator of forests (CCF) Debendra Dalai, CHB’s CEO Yashpal Garg, UT chief architect Kapil Setia, CHB chief engineer Rajiv Singla, CHB secretary Rakesh Popli and others clarified the issues raised by prospective bidders.

news.title: Yes Bank-DHFL case: CBI raids three top realtors' sites in Maharashtra
news.para: The central agency is investigating their financial connection with Dewan Housing Finance Corporation Ltd (DHFL) and Radius Group. It had arrested Sanjay Chhabria of the Radius Group on Thursday.

news.title: Fundraising via REITs, InvITs slumps 59% to Rs 22,145-crore in FY22
news.para: REITs and InvITs are relatively new investment instruments in the Indian context but extremely popular in global markets.

news.title: Astral to acquire 51% stake in Gem Paints for Rs 194 crore
news.para: ​​Astral has entered into a definitive agreement with Gem Paints and its shareholders after the deal was approved by its board on Friday, it said in a regulatory filing.

news.title: Ambuja Cements to expand capacities to meet increasing demand
news.para: This plant has enhanced Ambuja's clinker capacity by 3 million tonnes per annum and cement sales potential by 5 million tonnes per annum, ACL said in a statement on Friday.

news.title: Telangana keen on joining hands with builders to skill locals: KT Rama Rao
news.para: KTR said such a real estate specific skilling infrastructure will create an ecosystem for the sector to thrive in Telangana as it will reduce dependence on labour from other states.

news.title: Construction equipment sales drop 8% to 85,385 units FY22: ICEMA
news.para: The earthmoving equipment segment which accounts for nearly three-fourths of the total construction equipment sales in India, experienced 14 per cent decline in growth during FY22, while road construction equipment sales were lower by 10 per cent during the same year.

news.title: Ahmedabad: 1,240 construction workers died on job in 14 years
news.para: Vipul Pandya, general secretary of Construction Workers’ Association, said that they had filed RTIs to various district and city police forces to get details.

news.title: Glitch in Nagpur civic body property tax payment portal irks taxpayers
news.para: The system upgrade has started with NMC shifting its system to geo-fencing (an application which maps boundaries by using GIS data, so only authorised person can access the fence).
